interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MYFOOT Moisturizing Foot Wipe for After Foot Mask Peel or After Beach, Fresh Cleansing Wet Wipes Helps to Soothe Dry Heels, Repair and Hydrate Healthy Feet with Vitamin E & Aloe
Review Date: 2021/03/02
Store: MYFOOT
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MYFOOT', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count'}
Review Text: Nice product.  Easy to use. They come in a wrapper, not too wet.  No strong scent. I used them after work and they were okay.  Did not clean my feet or make them soft. Just a  wipe down and a little more clean feel.
Review Title: okay feet wipes
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Not for long hair.
3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Vedory
['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
{'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
This one was a dud for me. Although the bracket did stay in place it made me look like an anteater. It only would work with certain masks. The plastic was hard, but looks like it would be easy to clean. I used a couple times, but have just gone back to not wearing anything.
Skip this face mask bracket
Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Keiby Citom
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
Thick nail files. Very high end quality. Got plenty for the price. Work as expected, even better.
Great quality nail file
Hemp Lotion for Dry Skin - Soothing Rose Flower & Aloe Hydrate Your Complexion - Non-Greasy, Vegan, 7Oz, 250Mg Hemp, Fragrance & Paraben Free - Guayaquil By La La Leaf
LA LA LEAF
{'Brand': 'LA LA LEAF', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '7.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '8.19 x 2.28 x 2.17 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002750125'}
Amazing lotion, probably one of the best I have used.  My skin stays glowing after forever. There is no scent which is nice. Pretty packaging.
Amazing lotion
1513 by LA LA LEAF - All Natural Facial Cream, 750mg Quick Absorbing Hemp Moisturizer with Rosehip, Carrot Seed and Provitamin B5 - Smooths Wrinkles for Firm Glowing Skin - Paraben-free, Cruelty-free, Vegan
LA LA LEAF
{'Brand': 'LA LA LEAF', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 3.2 x 2 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
This cream will leave your skin glowing! I have always had an issue with oily skin and this cream made it oily x 10.  My skin did not feel softer, just oily.  There is no scent which i appreciate.  The black and white packaging is pretty.
Be prepared for oily skin!
Wiwoseo Faux Mink Lashes False Eyelashes Dramatic 20MM Long Wispy Cat Eyes Look Lashes 20 Pairs Mixed 2 Styles Fake Eye Lashes Wholesale Pack
wiwoseo
{'Brand': 'Wiwoseo', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Cotton', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 7.6 x 0.7 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'F1507-5'}
Great dramatic lashes.  For me I had to cut to fit my eye, but it was was easy.  They stayed on all night when I went out and they feel very soft. I got several uses out of one pair, which is always nice.  Big package so no need to clean just throw out once you are done and grab a new pair.
pretty dramatic lashes for going out!
Lnlofen 2Pcs Hollow Woven Headband with Clips, Fashion Braided Headbands Double Layer Twist Plait Headband Hair Tools, Double Bangs Hairstyle Hairpin for Women Girls (Brown & Black)
Lnlofen
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Resin', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Lnlofen', 'Size': '2 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 7.83 x 0.59 inches; 1.34 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803793'}
I haven't worn a headband in years. These are soft and easy to wear, they dont hurt your head. Cute, unique design.
Fun unique design
KISSIO Lipstick Set,4Pcs Cigarette Matte Lipstick Set,Red Matte Pigmentation Lipstick,Long Lasting Waterproof Lipstick for women
KISSIO
{'Brand': 'KISSIO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Cleansing,Moisturizing,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '10.79 x 8.27 x 0.47 inches; 2.01 Ounces'}
I was very disappointed in the color of these lipsticks. One was very orange the other one was very pink. They were not matte they were hard to work with. The texture was very soft and messy.
If you are looking for matte fall colors skip these
Galashy Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit - 5 Pairs Reusable False Lashes, 2 Bottles Magnetic Liner, Tweezer Applicator Tool
GALASHY
{'Brand': 'GALASHY', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.35 x 0.75 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '860004689263'}
The lashes themselves are good quality but it’s hard to trim them to fit your own eyeshape. You need to put 2 layers of the eyeliner on your eyelid and it’s very hard to get off when you’re done. It’s sticky and can irritate your eyes.
Hard to remove

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user remains focused on beauty and self-care products, with a particular emphasis on skincare and makeup that enhance visual appeal. Their interest now also includes foot care solutions that contribute to an overall self-care routine.

- **Quality Preference:** Their commitment to high-quality, functional products continues to strengthen, with recent experiences reflecting a growing scrutiny of usability, notably in foot care products. They seek reliable performance that complements their aesthetic standards.

- **Usability Insight:** The user appreciates products that are easy to use, as highlighted by their recent experience with foot wipes which were convenient but fell short on delivering softness and thorough cleansing. This feedback reinforces their preference for effectiveness and ease of use across all beauty-related products.

- **Visual Appeal:** Consistently prioritizing modern and stylish packaging, their critical view on product claims is evident, particularly in both beauty and self-care items.

- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Their passion for DIY projects remains significant, showcasing creativity within their beauty and self-care routines.

- **Rating Behavior:** They maintain a discerning approach to evaluations, as reflected in their recent rating for a foot care product. While they noted some usability, they expect products to deliver on their promised benefits, aligning with their rigorous standards.

In summary, the user is creatively inclined, focusing on high-quality, effective beauty and self-care products that are conveniently designed and visually appealing. Recent feedback emphasizes the importance of usability and performance, particularly in foot care and makeup items.
